email.description: Email address of the intended recipient

timestamp.description: The time when the Sendgrid event was created.

ip.description: Which IP address was used to send the email.

tls.description: Whether or not TLS was used when sending the email

sg_message_id.description: Sengrid internal message id (same identifier for all unique email events)

cert_err.description: Whether there was a certificate error on the receiving side

url.description: The url of the link clicked by user. Only for click event

useragent.description: The user agent responsible for the event. Only for click, open and spamReport events

url_offset.description: More information about the link that was clicked.  Only for click event

smtp-id.description: An id attached to the message by the originating system. Only for delivery event

reason.description: Reason for dropped event. Only for dropped event

response.description: Server response on deferred email. Only for deferred or bounce event

attempts.description: Delivery attempt. Only for deferred event

type.description: Bounce type. Only for bounce event

status.description: Bounce status. Only for bounce event
